name: 2018 The 6th International Conference on Information Technology(ICIT 2019)--Ei Compendex & Scopus
content: \=Publication= 1-International Conference Proceedings indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (Web of Science) etc. 2-Information and Learning Science (ISSN: 2398-5348) indexed by Scopus, BFI (Denmark) - listed as New Library World, Current Abstracts; Current Index to Journals in Education; Education Full Text; Emerging Sources Citation Index, Information Science & Technology Abstracts; The Informed Librarian; INSPEC; zetoc, etc. \*Keynote Speaker I\* Prof. David Zhang, IEEE and IAPR Fellow, Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Hong Kong \*Keynote Speaker II\* Prof. Chin-Chen Chang IEEE and IET Fellow, Feng Chia University, Taiwan \*Keynote Speaker III\* Prof Mao Kezhi Nanyang Technological University, Singapore \*Keynote Speaker IV\* Prof. Xuefeng Liang Kyoto University, Japan
